parameters: I have to go to the uncle's place...
Welcome. Oh, are you here for an errand?
If there's something you want, please let me know.
Welcome. Oh, are you here for an errand?
If there's something you want, please let me know.

Um, do you have something called the Sorcerer's
Jar...?
The Sorcerer's Jar... Ah, I think I have it.

Did Livid-san ask you to do this? If you mention
being a sorcerer around here...

That person is just like that, you know. (That
person, always catching cute ones, huh~)

Oh, it's nothing! (Oops, I accidentally said it
out loud)

(Well, if we're talking about being perverted, I'm
not losing either...)

A-anyway, the jar should be in the warehouse
behind here.

I just can't remember where I put it... If you
don't mind, would you help me search for it, miss?
Alright, then will you come with me?

If there's anything else you want, please let me
know.
Oh, it's you, young lady. What's the matter?

Are you looking for something again? (Is there
another chance for some naughty business~?)

(What should I do? They are someone I know,
but...)
I'll gather my courage and ask for a favor

(What's with this person, they really are a
pervert...!)
(Wait, at this age!? No way... but still...)
(Perhaps this is some kind of trap...)

Young lady, you mentioned 'essence'... What do you
use it for?
Um, it's necessary for making a secret potion...
Ah, I understand. (It's Livid-san again... haha)

(But is there really a secret potion made from
semen?)

(Well, whatever. Since I can't indulge in
perversion for free)

Alright, I got it. I'll gladly help! I can't just
leave someone in trouble, you know!

(Finally... I... will give myself to this person
for the first time...)

(Fufufu~ I won't let you go until I've drained you
completely \I[0])

If there's anything else you want, please let me
know...
Oh my, isn't it a young lady? What's the matter?
To be so direct...!! (A complete seductress!!)

Because... it's all part of my training... I can't
help it, you know. \I[0]

Ahaha... What an intense training. (Looks like
I've been completely brainwashed by Livid-san...)

Alright, I'll stick with you no matter what,
mister! (This is a good toy \I[0])
Nah... I'm actually running away from home.

Huh? Are you going to get scolded by your dad
again? It's better for you to go back home
quickly.
Oh, isn't it Clot? Are you running errands today?

No, that's not it. Um... do you happen to know a
girl with pink hair...?

Oh, I see. So you're saying you're indebted to
Livid-san's place...

Yes, yes, yes, yes!!! That's the one! Do you know
her!?

Well, I wouldn't say I know her... I don't know
where she is or what she's doing.

(I know the taste of raw man very well, though...
\I[0])
I just want any information I can get...
(What, are you in love or something?)

(Kuu~ I want you to tell me~ If you tell me, will
I faint~?)
No, I don't know. Sorry, I can't be of any help.

(Well, since I'm the son of a business partner,
let's stop here.)

Oh, isn't it Clot? Have you found that child we
were looking for?
